sentences.en: Apollo was the Greek god of the arts, prophecy, medicine and light.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗是希腊神话中主管艺术 、 预言 、 医药和光明之神.

sentences.en: Greek forces clashed against Turks in the hills.
sentences.cn: 希腊军队和土耳其人在丘陵地发生了冲突.

sentences.en: Greek yogurt contains much less fat than double cream.
sentences.cn: 希腊酸奶比高脂浓奶油所含脂肪要少得多。

sentences.en: He didn't speak anything but Greek.
In Greek mythology, Zeus was the ruler of Gods and men.
sentences.cn: 在希腊神话中, 宙斯是众神和人类的统治者.

sentences.en: Latin and Greek will be squeezed out of school timetables.
sentences.cn: 拉丁语和希腊语将退出学校的课程表。

sentences.en: Many English words are derived from Latin and Greek words.
sentences.cn: 许多英语词是从拉丁词和希腊词派生而来的.

sentences.en: Many English words are derived from Latin and Greek.
sentences.cn: 英语很多词源出于拉丁文和希腊文.

sentences.en: Mary does her hair after the ancient Greek fashion.
sentences.cn: 玛丽仿照古希腊的式样做头发.
希腊哲学家亚里士多德

sentences.en: The Greek seaman went to the hospital five times.
sentences.cn: 这位希腊海员到该医院去过五次.

sentences.en: The story was a conflation of Greek myths.
sentences.cn: 这个故事将很多希腊神话糅合在一起。

sentences.en: The very earliest sculptures were made under the influence of Greek art.
sentences.cn: 最早的雕塑作品受到了希腊艺术的影响。

sentences.en: Zeus and Aphrodite were ancient Greek deities.
sentences.cn: 宙斯和阿佛洛狄是古希腊的神.

words.tran_cn: 希腊的；希腊人的，希腊语的

phrases.phrase: beware (或 fear) the Greeks bearing gifts
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)提防带礼物的希腊人（提防表面慷慨善良实际可能不怀好意的人）
古典希腊；古典希腊语（指公元前5和4世纪古典雅文学中使用的希腊语）

trans.tran_en: relating to Greece, its people, or its language

trans.tran_cn: 希腊语，希腊人，女生联谊会会员
